nextapp.echo.extras.app
Class AccordionPane

java.lang.Object
  nextapp.echo.app.Component
      nextapp.echo.extras.app.AccordionPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, nextapp.echo.app.Pane, nextapp.echo.app.PaneContainer, nextapp.echo.app.RenderIdSupport
public class AccordionPane
extends nextapp.echo.app.Component
implements nextapp.echo.app.Pane, nextapp.echo.app.PaneContainer

AccordionPane component: contains multiple children in vertically arranged tabs that slide up and down to reveal a single child at a time. May contain multiple children. May contain Panes as children.

See Also:
Serialized Form
